subject: Order #ssn5251
description_text: Hey I event heard anything about my order and just wanted to see if there is a time frame for when it will ship ?

conversations.body_text: Hi Zach Birnbaum,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.Â
We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224410120
